rules.formula: AND($Profile.Name<> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Identify Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Develop Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Create Offer (Bid)'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Win the Case (Negotiate)') ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c, 'Fast Track Opportunity')) )
